name: Scarlet Maren Dress
description:
This gorgeous chiffon dress has a softly draped neckline inspired by legendary 1950s designer Ceil Chapman.  With a built-in slip under the full, pleated skirt, you'll love the way Maren moves.  It is made of a scarlet light poly chiffon.

description:

name: Slate Intermission Coat
description:
spired by a 1940s dress coat, the Intermission is just as suitable for a night at the opera as is it is cute over slim fitting jeans.  The nipped-in waist, three-quarter sleeves with folded-back cuffs, and full skirt make the Intermission a show-stopper.

The Intermission's cotton-blend fabric has a subtle sheen on the outside and a soft satin feel to the inside. Slate is a featured color for the Fall 2013 Petrunia Collection.

X-Small: Bust 34'', Waist 25", Hip 36"
Small: Bust 35-36'', Waist 26-27", Hip 37-38"

name: Red Stripe Button Dress
description:
We loved the decorative quality of the diagonal buttons across the chest, paired with the swingy full skirt.  The candy stripe fabric is soft and slightly stretchy cotton/poly blend.  There is a slight texture to the stripe, with the thinnest gold thread running through it, which adds a subtle touch of shine.  This is an extremely comfortable and wearable dress.  Sure to be a perennial favorite.
